name: Fall From Grace (Frizuo)
description:
Controls:

Move: A/D

Ability: Space

You're a ball who just dropped out of heaven, and it's gonna be a long fall down! Fall as far as you can without being hit by one of the many hazards present!

Note: If the game's laggy in the browser, try downloading the desktop build!

All art and programming is done by me

Sound effects were made in sfxr

BGM: https://beepartz.itch.io/fuse-retro-fusion-music-loops

Bug fixes: 

- The player can no longer build up speed by holding a direction while in the ability menu.

- The player can no longer use their ability while in the ability menu.
